SEARCH
Package enquiry

Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
enquiry.Message
enquiry.Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Message
Enquiries consist of a question for a camp, and a reply if one has been made

  • Field Details

    • reply

      private String reply
      Reply of the enquiry. Usually an answer

    • resolved

      private boolean resolved
      Status of the enquiry, can be resolved or unresolved.

    • replyAuthor

      private User replyAuthor
      Author of the reply

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(Camp camp, Student author, String description, User replyAuthor, String reply, boolean resolved)
      Constructor for an enquiry.
      Parameters:
      camp - Camp object the enquiry is associated with
      author - Student object who authored the enquiry
      description - Body text of the enquiry
      replyAuthor - User object who authored the reply
      reply - Body text of the reply
      resolved - Boolean on whether the enquiry has been replied to

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Fetches reply author
      Returns:
      User object who made the reply

      public boolean getResolved()
      Fetch resolved status of the enquiry
      Returns:
      Boolen of enquiry status

    • setResolved

      Set resolved status of the enquiry
      Parameters:
